comment: I had nothing wrong against her. she fine but hard to understand. Math is universal no matter where you go in this world. I think she has her own way to teach but she need to be flexible on her material. You are only right when you math is correct but for her you must follow her math. It is easy to make an A and pass  if you put little efforts.
This is probably the best Math Professor I've had. She explains every step when teaching a problem and is always helpful when needed.I would definately take her again for Math!

Teaches very very fast. Is always in a rush to cut class early. Very willing to help in office hrs. Mult. choice test on 1111 class only. I will not take her again due to she teaches wayyy too fast. After we asked her to slow down. And just repeats the book and makes many mistakes due to speed

I would not recommend her, although at times she can be helpful. I don't know what her, credentials are but  guess they are not very strong given her lack of mathmatical understanding. She rarely does problems from earlier lessons? Didn't like the books directions, solution manual is not very helpful.

Ms. Crespo is part of the adjunct/part-time faculty at SPSU. I took College Algebra with her my first semester and achieved a perfect score. Given that the class is not hard at all, she was an effective teacher. She does give help when needed and although the accent is a little rough, you'll be in good shape by doing some work. Overall: EASY.
Does give a lot of homework and quizzes, but she gives a practice test which looks just like the test. Pretty easy class as long as you don't fall behind.

Yes you have to do homework and come to class, otherwise you don't  learn. She is helpful and you can stop her if you do not understand. Practice tests help and there was not an aweful amount of homework. Only people I saw complaining were slacking off.
SHe's pretty much useless. Just goes over the exact same examples that are in the book. Very boring and her accent is annoying.
Great teacher.. She reminds you of her office hrs everyday if you need help. she stops in class and asks for questions..  I made an A no problem!!

Great teacher! She was always willing to help the students that cared. Tests are easy and you have a practice test that is the same as the test. Not too much homework. Frequent quizzes, but EASY! I would highly recommend her.
She's cool! You really understand after a while... Easy! But allot of work, EASYYYY  buut.t...tt..  allooooottt  of work!.
DRY! My math lab is essential as all assignments are completed mml- she is  a bit confusing. she allows the use of notes for several exams
It's a very easy class if you're good at math. If not, it's fairly easy to catch on. All the tests are multiple choice, which helps. Just remember to do the online homework.

She is a very nice teacher.I saw her smile several times, but it annoys her when people leave early,though she allows them to.She gave extra credit on the final for perfect attendance and only one absence.Her tests are challenging.  Don't take this class expecting an easy A,but if you're pretty good at algebra and apply yourself,you should do good.
she never smiles...and neither will you after sitting in her class for eternity
